definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: He wanted to see if he could catch sight of the rival submarine.
sentences.chinese: 他想看看能否扫到敌方潜水艇一眼。

sentences.english: Some submarines carry many men and stay underwater for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 有些潜水艇能装人，并在水下呆好几个星期。

sentences.english: Also the Ocra whales would have been detected by the Russian sonar if they were nearby.
sentences.chinese: 而且，如果食人鲸接近潜水艇，声纳会发现他们。

sentences.english: It was like eating leftovers from a submarine. (See pictures of Japan and the world.)
sentences.chinese: 它实在像是潜水艇里的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: A submarine glided silently through the water.
sentences.chinese: 一艘潜水艇无声地在水中滑行。

sentences.english: "It's a bit like looking through a porthole in a submarine, " said Schnitzer.
sentences.chinese: “这有点像通过潜水艇的舷窗往里看，”施尼策尔说。

sentences.english: The supply ship refreshed the submarines between battles.
sentences.chinese: 补给船利用战斗间隙给潜水艇以新的供应品。

sentences.english: It was like eating leftovers from a submarine.
sentences.chinese: 它实在像是潜水艇里的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: The submarine has four stern rudder with a single large shaft.
sentences.chinese: 潜水艇采用单轴四尾舵。

sentences.english: A company needed a submarine to submerge into the deep sea.
sentences.chinese: 一家公司需要一艘潜水艇潜水至深海。

sentences.english: Within a short time, everything on the submarine was buttoned up.
sentences.chinese: 在很短时间内，潜水艇上一切都封闭好了。

sentences.english: And we live beneath the waves in our yellow submarine.
sentences.chinese: 在黄色潜水艇里我们乘风破浪。

sentences.english: The submarine submerged to avoid enemy ships.
sentences.chinese: 潜水艇潜入水中以躲避敌船。

sentences.english: Diesel-electric submarines are represented by about 20 Kilo class vessels.
sentences.chinese: 柴油电潜水艇由大约20公斤类船代表。

sentences.english: No more do we have to accept a generic start date for a certain U-boat .
sentences.chinese: 我们也不必须为某种潜水艇接受一般的开始日期。
